Translations.Text: He knows contents womb! Non anima knows quod testimentum happen it cras non 1 knows qui terra he she abiit! DEUS est Omniscient Cognizant . . [32:1] Ut. L. M
book est doubt revelation Dominus universe
They dictus He fabricated it Indeed hoc est truth tuus Dominus warn people qui nunquam received warner vos they guided
DEUS EST UNUS created CAELUM TERRA everything them 6 FERIA TUNC assumed TOTUS authority Vos habet nullus Eum prout Dominus nor perfecit vos habet intercessor! Vos non take heed
totus matters controlled Eum caelum terra! To Eum feria est equivalent to 1000 de tuus annus
Knower de totus secrets declarations; Almighty Merciful
He est Unus perfected everything He created started creation human ex clay
Tunc He continued his reproduction certain humilis liquid
He shaped eum blew eum His anima He dedit vos hearing eyesight brains; rarely est vos thankful
They wonder Post nos vanish terra perfecit nos created anew Ergo prout regards meeting their Dominus they est disbelievers
Dictus Vos put decessus angel whose charge vos locus tunc tuus Dominus vos returned
Unus vos vide guilty when they bow their heads their Dominus Noster Dominus statim nos vide nos heard Send nos nos est righteous! Nunc nos attained certainty
Habet nos willed nos dedit omnis anima its guidance it iam predetermined ego fill Hell jinns humans totus unus
Taste consequences de tuus forgetting hoc feria; statim nos forget vos. Vos incurred eternal retribution in return tuus suus works
Unus people enim believe in noster revelations est those fall prostrate upon hearing them! They glorify praise their Dominus any arrogance
Their sides readily forsake their thorus in order worship their Dominus reverence ac hope ac noster provisions them they dedit
Vos non habet idea quam much joy happiness waiting vos prout reward tuus (righteous) works
Unus est believer same prout unus est est wicked? They est aequalis
Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita they deserved eternal Paradise! Such est their abode in return their works
Prout pro wicked their destiny est Hell. Omnis temporis they try sinister it they forced back They told Taste agony Hell vos used disbelieve in
(Nos let them taste parvulus retribution hoc saeculum) ante they incur major retribution Hereafter ut they take hint reform
Qui malus than unus est reminded de these revelations his Dominus tunc insists disregarding them? Nos certainly punish guilty
Nos dedit Moses scripture - Non harbor any doubt meeting Eum! - Nos factus it guide Infans Israel
Nos appointed them imams guided prout noster commandments they steadfastly persevered attained certainty noster revelations
Tuus Dominus est Unus scabinus them Feria Resurrection everything they disputed
it perfecit ever occur them quam multus generations nos annihilated them? They statim vivens walk in their patres domus. Hoc provisus sufficient proofs they non hear
they non realize nos drive aqua barren terra, produce it crops feed their livestock alias prout themselves? they non vide
They challenge Ubi ut victory vos est est truthful
Dictus feria such victory advenit believing testimentum non benefit those non believe ante ut, nor testimentum they dedit alias chance
Ergo disregard them wait they too waiting
